title: Convert Eagle Logo to Circular Design with Animation and Remove Email from Header

requirements.text: Convert the eagle logo background from square to a perfect circular shape with fully symmetrical, clean smooth edges centered around the eagle head. Remove any visible square corners or masking artifacts.

quotes: Remove the current square background behind the eagle logo. Convert the logo container into a perfect circular background.

acceptanceCriteria: Logo background is a perfect circle with no square corners visible
Circle is fully symmetrical with clean smooth edges
Eagle head is centered perfectly within the circular background
No masking artifacts or distortions visible

requirements.text: Style the circular logo background with a dark base color, neon cyan glow, subtle futuristic gradient or glass effect, maintaining premium AI automation branding consistent with SwiftOps design.

quotes: Dark circular base with neon cyan glow. Subtle futuristic gradient or glass effect. Maintain premium AI automation branding.

acceptanceCriteria: Dark circular base is applied
Neon cyan glow is visible and elegant
Gradient or glass effect is subtle and futuristic
Design matches SwiftOps premium branding aesthetic

requirements.text: Add a soft, elegant neon ring glow around the circular logo. Include an optional rotating or breathing light ring effect for a futuristic feel. The glow must not be overly bright.

quotes: Add soft neon ring glow around the circle. Glow should be elegant, not overly bright. Optional rotating or breathing light ring for futuristic feel.

acceptanceCriteria: Soft neon ring glow is visible around the circle
Glow intensity is elegant and not overly bright

Effect enhances the futuristic aesthetic

requirements.text: Update the eagle logo animation to match the circular design with a 2-4 second sequence: circular energy ring forms first, neon outline draws the circle smoothly, robotic scan passes across the circle, eagle logo activates inside, eyes or neon accents power on, and final soft pulse glow stabilization. Avoid square reveal animations, hard edge transitions, and sudden pop effects.

quotes: Circular energy ring forms first. Neon outline draws the circle smoothly. Robotic scan passes across the circle. Eagle logo activates inside the circle. Eyes or neon accents power ON. Final soft pulse glow stabilization.

acceptanceCriteria: Animation sequence lasts 2-4 seconds
Circular energy ring forms first as the opening stage
Neon outline draws the circle smoothly without hard edges
Robotic scan effect passes across the circular area
Eagle logo activates inside the circle with eyes/accents powering on
Animation ends with soft pulse glow stabilization
No square reveal animations or sudden pop effects present

acceptanceCriteria: Logo circle is perfectly round on desktop screens

Logo circle is perfectly round on mobile screens

requirements.text: Optimize logo animation performance to remain smooth and lightweight, ensuring fast loading on both mobile and desktop devices.

acceptanceCriteria: Animation runs smoothly at 60fps on desktop
Animation runs smoothly on mobile devices
